---
name: "Map-Based Event Discovery"
about: "Display activities on a map with color-coded markers by category."
title: "Feature: Map-Based Event Discovery"
labels: [enhancement]
---

**Summary:**
Show all activities on a map, using color-coded markers for different categories (e.g., Sports, Academics, Misc).

**Details:**
- Integrate a map component (e.g., Google Maps, Leaflet).
- Each event is shown as a marker; clicking shows details and sign-up option.
- Add location field to activities data model.

**Benefit:**
Makes it easier for students to find nearby events and visually understand activity distribution.
